summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Admin Preview Mode feature on Form Config page. All requested features tested and verified working correctly.

issues: Minor: Chart width/height warnings in console (non-blocking) - 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0'
Minor: MUI Grid deprecation warnings for 'item', 'xs', 'sm', 'md' props (non-breaking, should update to Grid v2)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Preview Mode feature fully tested and working. All features verified: Preview Mode button, category dropdown, placeholders, visibility rules, seller types, preferences, contact methods, and filter button.

tested_features.preview_mode_button: PASS - Button visible on Form Config page header, opens dialog on click
tested_features.preview_dialog: PASS - Dialog opens with title 'Form Preview Mode' and subtitle 'See how your configurations appear in the listing form'
tested_features.category_selector_dropdown: PASS - Dropdown shows 15 categories (excluding 'global'): Default, Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, Phones & Tablets, Home Furniture, Fashion & Beauty, Jobs & Services, Pets, Sports & Hobbies, Kids & Baby, Health & Medical, Agriculture, Friendship & Dating, Community
tested_features.default_placeholders: PASS - Shows 'What are you selling?' for title, 'Include details like condition, features, reason for selling...' for description
tested_features.friendship_dating_placeholders: PASS - Shows 'Post Title' label, 'e.g., Looking for hiking buddies' placeholder, 'About You' label, 'Introduce yourself, your interests, and what you are looking for...' placeholder
tested_features.visibility_rules_hidden_price: PASS - Shows 'Price field is hidden for this category' alert for Friendship & Dating
tested_features.visibility_rules_hidden_condition: PASS - Shows 'Condition field is hidden for this category' alert for Friendship & Dating
tested_features.visibility_rules_chat_only: PASS - Shows 'Chat only - Phone and WhatsApp options are disabled for this category' message for Friendship & Dating
tested_features.listed_by_options: PASS - Default shows Individual, Owner, Company, Dealer, Broker. Friendship & Dating shows only Individual
tested_features.preferences_section: PASS - Shows Accept Offers, Accept Exchanges, Price Negotiable toggles
tested_features.active_configuration_summary: PASS - Shows Placeholder Config, Seller Type Config, Preferences Config, Visibility Rules status
tested_features.filter_configs_button: PASS - 'Filter Configs for This Category' button visible and functional
tested_features.close_button: PASS - Close button works correctly to dismiss dialog
